name: Prosperity Bancshares, Inc.
description: Prosperity Bancshares, Inc. is a publicly traded bank holding company based in Houston, Texas, that provides a wide range of financial services through its bank subsidiary, Prosperity Bank. Founded in 1983, the company has grown significantly, operating over 250 locations across Texas and Oklahoma. Prosperity Bancshares focuses on delivering personalized banking solutions to individuals, businesses, and commercial clients. The bank offers various products, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, credit cards, and wealth management services. Prosperity Bank prides itself on its commitment to customer service, financial stability, and community involvement, aiming to foster long-lasting relationships with its clients. The company has consistently demonstrated strong financial performance, underpinned by prudent risk management and a conservative lending philosophy. In addition to traditional banking services, Prosperity Bancshares leverages technology to enhance customer experiences, providing online banking, mobile banking apps, and digital payment solutions. The firm also emphasizes corporate social responsibility, actively participating in community development and charitable initiatives. With a mission to exceed customer expectations and contribute positively to the communities it serves, Prosperity Bancshares is well-positioned for future growth in the competitive banking landscape.

seo.meta_title: Prosperity Bancshares, Inc. | Comprehensive Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Prosperity Bancshares, Inc., a leading financial institution providing a wide range of banking services. Learn about our commitment to customer service and community involvement.

faq.question: What services does Prosperity Bancshares offer?
faq.answer: Prosperity Bancshares offers personal banking, business banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Prosperity Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Prosperity Bancshares is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Prosperity Bancshares?
faq.answer: David Zalman is the CEO of Prosperity Bancshares, Inc.

faq.question: How can I access online banking?
faq.answer: You can access online banking through our website at www.prosperitybankusa.com.
